rulesDesc2: Stone defeats scissors (“stone blunts or breaks scissors“)
draw: If the players showed the same sign, then a draw is counted and the game is replayed
descWin: You can continue playing or save to the leaderboard
descLose: Oops, next time you will definitely be lucky
name: Name
errorMessage: Your result was not recorded on the leaderboard. Check the spelling of the name
emptyLeader: There are no leaders at the moment
